@@ -31,0 +32,1 @@
+import java.awt.GraphicsEnvironment;
@@ -32,0 +34,1 @@
+
@@ -40,0 +43,4 @@
+
+        // no system clipboard in the headless mode
+        boolean expected  = !GraphicsEnvironment.isHeadless();
+
@@ -42,1 +49,1 @@
-        if (!isCheckPermissionCalled) {
+        if (isCheckPermissionCalled != expected) {
